when these parameters were varied to match the 15 experimental conditions, the predicted HA values strongly resembled those of the actual HA values, with the greatest residual being 11 (ng/µg protein) and an R 2 coefficient of .832 (83.2%), demonstrating considerable goodness of fit. Taken together, these observations validate both the regression equation in how well it approximates the real, as well as the prediction of the most effective 4-MU formulation.
